body:
WARNING: I had my friend record for me cuz my laptop cant handle recording
minecraft so excuse the derps and fails in the vid! x3

I released my Pack World (only compatible for 1.7 and for those 1.7 users who like
their pack textures broken cuz of 1.8) and one of my public texturepacks for a while

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nAf9stZHFh8
